dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication
dependencies.name: py-filelock

dependencies.description:
Client library to download and publish models, datasets and other repos
on the huggingface.co hub.
dependencies.name: py-huggingface-hub

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description: Alternative regular expression module, to replace re.
dependencies.name: py-regex

dependencies.description:
Unsupervised text tokenizer for Neural Network-based text generation.
These are the Python bindings.
dependencies.name: py-sentencepiece

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.
dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm

dependent_to.description:
A collection of open source benchmarks used to evaluate PyTorch
performance.
dependent_to.name: py-torchbenchmark

dependent_to.description:
A library for accelerating Transformer models on NVIDIA GPUs, including
fp8 precision on Hopper GPUs.
dependent_to.name: py-transformer-engine

description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch
name: py-transformers

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
